mapper.select: select CAST(orders.order_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS order_date, CAST(members.join_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS join_date, members.name, apply.name as apply_name, apply.sub_category_seq, orders.delivery_status, orders.total_price, orders.status, members.id, orders.order_seq from orders join members on members.id = orders.member_id join apply on apply.application_seq = orders.application_seq join book on orders.order_seq = book.order_seq GROUP BY orders.ORDER_SEQ, members.name, orders.order_date, members.join_date, orders.delivery_status, orders.total_price, members.id, orders.order_seq, orders.status, apply.name, apply.sub_category_seq
